title: Plugs
description: For a year, Blake has been working toward making love with his Master, Archer. You name it they’ve done it, except for that one act. Tonight, the waiting is over. Blake is naked, prepared, and waiting for his Master to take him.When his Master arrives and finds Blake might have gone too far in preparing himself, though, a punishment of six plugs is given before Blake can have what he so desperately wants.Will the night end the way he’s been dreaming and bring Blake and Archer closer together, or will one thing not lead to another?
author: Sean Michael
